meanings.definition: A person who avoids work or duty by pretending to be ill or incapacitated.
meanings.sent1: The shirker always had an excuse to avoid helping with chores.
meanings.sent2: The teacher noticed the shirker pretending to be sick to skip class.
meanings.sent3: The shirker's sudden 'illness' miraculously disappeared when it was time to play.
meanings.sent4: The shirker's laziness was like a shadow, always following close behind.
meanings.sent5: The image of the shirker lounging on the couch instead of working was etched in everyone's mind.
